author: dandiep
msg: Add a Maven 2 Build. Unfortunately it is currently impossible
to skip the download with M2. I've filed a bug with them
and will hopefully hear back soon.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2006] Fixing url rewriting for child POMs in sibling directories of parent POM (or anything other than subdir). First guess is based on parent POM file, but if parent POM is built from repository, will use the module artifactId as a basis instead.
